# fairys-space



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description               | Type                                         | Default    |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `align`    | `align`    | 对齐方式, 支持 start、end、center | `"baseline" \| "center" \| "end" \| "start"` | `'center'` |
| `gap`      | `gap`      | 间隔距离, 默认8px               | `number`                                     | `8`        |
| `vertical` | `vertical` | 是否为垂直间距                   | `boolean`                                    | `false`    |
| `wrap`     | `wrap`     | 是否自动换行                    | `boolean`                                    | `false`    |
